io.sarl.sre.services.probing

Class SynchronousProbeService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractService
      • io.sarl.sre.services.AbstractSreService
        • io.sarl.sre.services.probing.AbstractProbeService
          • io.sarl.sre.services.probing.SynchronousProbeService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service, IProbeReleaseListener, ProbeService, EventListener

    public class SynchronousProbeService
extends AbstractProbeService
    This class is the implementation of a probe service that is updating the values synchronously. Synchronous updates must be explicitly started by invoking AbstractProbeService.sync().
    Since:
    0.10
    Version:
    0.11.0 2020-05-31 12:31:25
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    See Also:
    AsynchronousProbeService
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.plugin
